comments.body: There's `PathOutputCommitterFactory.COMMITTER_FACTORY_CLASS` and friends. That class is tagged "Private / Unstable" though, which seems odd for a class where config options are defined...

comments.body: I'm using those options for testing now. Even so, I'm not sure the setting needed to say "experimental/unstable". What do you suggest?

comments.body:
A lot of these constants are not used anywhere. What's the goal of this object?

It can't be for end users, because this is in an `internal` package.
